Posts.Content: Jun 28, 2013 03:41PM lpc wrote: GMA my husband has been on lyrica for many years because of chronic pain. He did not like it and tried early on to get off it but the withdrawal was worse than the side effects. Withdrawal headaches were awful. Hopefully your headaches will not last too long. Wish you the best. Lisa

Posts.Title: Life really DOES go on! Bugs SpunkyGirl

Posts.Content: Sep 17, 2013 05:45PM lpc wrote: I did dose dense ac followed by dose dense taxol. I work retail mgt on feet all day. I worked 36 hrs chemo week and 40 hrs off week. For me it was very doable. I did apply for intermittent FMLA but never used it. I did not decide what to do until I got thru first tx to see how I would react to it. Good luck to you Lisa
